Title: The Crossroads of Innovation and Privacy: Private Synthetic Data for Generative AI
Authors: Gbola Afonja, Robert Sim, Zinan Lin, Huseyin Atahan Inan, Sergey Yekhanin

Name: Sim-PE

Title: Is API Access to LLMs Useful for Generating Private Synthetic Tabular Data?
Authors: Marika Swanberg, Ryan McKenna, Edo Roth, Albert Cheu, Peter Kairouz

Title: Understanding Aggregate Trends for Apple Intelligence Using Differential Privacy
Summary: PE for understanding trends in real user data

Title: Private Federated Learning using Preference-Optimized Synthetic Data
Name: Preference Optimization for Private Client Data (POPri)
Summary: DP federated learning by fine-tuning LLMs using Direct Preference Optimization (DPO) on preference data collected from clients via PE
Organizations: Carnegie Mellon University, Pittsburgh Supercomputing Center, Coldrays
Authors: Charlie Hou, Mei-Yu Wang, Yige Zhu, Daniel Lazar, Giulia Fanti

Title: PCEvolve: Private Contrastive Evolution for Synthetic Dataset Generation via Few-Shot Private Data and Generative APIs
Name: Private Contrastive Evolution (PCEvolve)
Summary: Replace the data selection step in PE with an exponential mechanism that uses a utility function designed to emphasize inter-class discrimination
Organizations:
Shanghai Jiao Tong University, Tsinghua University, Hong Kong Polytechnic University, Shanghai Artificial Intelligence Laboratory, Stevens Institute of Technology, Queen's University Belfast, Shanghai Key Laboratory of Trusted Data Circulation and
Governance in Web3
Authors: Jianqing Zhang, Yang Liu, Jie Fu, Yang Hua, Tianyuan Zou, Jian Cao, Qiang Yang

Title: Private Evolution Converges
Authors: Tomas Gonzalez, Giulia Fanti, Aaditya Ramdas

Title: Synthesize Privacy-Preserving High-Resolution Images via Private Textual Intermediaries
Name: Synthesis via Private Textual Intermediaries (SPTI)
Summary: Enable DP image synthesis via DP text synthesis by: (1) converting private images to text using image-to-text models, (2) applying the PE to generate DP text, and (3) transforming the DP text back into images using text-to-image models
Organizations: Peking University, Microsoft Research, Sun Yat-sen University
Authors: Haoxiang Wang, Zinan Lin, Da Yu, Huishuai Zhang

Title: DPImageBench: A Unified Benchmark for Differentially Private Image Synthesis
Name: DPImageBench
Summary: Benchmarking PE (and other methods) on DP image synthesis
Authors: Chen Gong, Kecen Li, Zinan Lin, Tianhao Wang
